title: npc mod里的火枪子弹算是实物么= =
author: darknessflameII
txt_content: 发现一个很有趣的现象，用npc mod里的火枪怎么打也打不到小黑

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content:
都是属于类似箭的一种射出物体= =
反正只要是射出去的都应该属于实体= =

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content:
of course, endermen will not get hit by any projectiles, not arrows, and not even ghast fireballs lol.
They teleport away at the moment the projectile is about to hit

replies.author: A王O子A
replies.txt_content: 当然了……小黑用弓箭也打不到——他会瞬移啊

replies.author: darknessflameII
replies.txt_content: 但是更多武器中的燧发枪（类似散弹）打小黑很疼的
